verbs.description: Just a few hours before President Trump [V: was] scheduled to sit down with North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un for a historic summit for peace and denuclearization on Monday , CBS correspondent Bianna Golodryga chided the President ’s ability to negotiate in the United States’ best interest .
